\newglossaryentry{Cost} {
    symbol={\ensuremath{c}},
    name={\ensuremath{\glssymbol{Cost}[_{i}] }},
    description={The cost (per gram) of the ingredients}
}

    symbol={\ensuremath{q}},
    name={\ensuremath{\glssymbol{Contributes}[_{r,i}] }},
    description={The contribution per g of ingredients to requirements}
}
\newglossaryentry{Lower} {
    symbol={\ensuremath{r^{min}}},
    name={\ensuremath{\glssymbol{Lower}[_{i_1}]  = {-(\infty)}}},
    description={Minimal required amount of requirement}
}
\newglossaryentry{Upper} {
    symbol={\ensuremath{r^{max}}},
    name={\ensuremath{\glssymbol{Upper}[_{r}]  \ge \glssymbol{Lower}[_{r}], = {\infty}}},
    description={Maximal required amount of requirement}
}
